entities.description: Amount of weight lost without trying during the worst period of problems.
Period of time when problems such as feeling down were the worst.
Problems with sleeping, staying asleep, or waking early during the worst period of problems.
Sleeping a lot more than usual during the worst period of problems.
Feeling tired or low on energy nearly every day, even without heavy physical effort.

relationships.description: Indicates how much weight the respondent lost without trying during the worst period of their problems.
Relates to the period when the respondent's issues were the worst, including feelings of being down.
Indicates the sleeping problems experienced by the respondent during the worst period.
Indicates if the respondent slept a lot more than usual during the worst period of problems.
Indicates if the respondent felt tired or low on energy nearly every day, even without significant physical effort.
